siteMetadata.defaultTitle: Design 418: Digital Agency Providing Serverless + React.js Engineering
siteMetadata.preamble: We're a Los Angeles based team of designers and software engineers.
siteMetadata.defaultDescription: We develop exceptional products that meet real needs.
siteMetadata.postamble: Think we can help your project? We'd love to hear from you:

node.html:
Developed the Disney Instant Visa Progam and their migration to a new analytics system for all their sites.

  • Implemented new analytics system
  • angular js UI for Disney Instant Visa
  • Java services for Disney Instant Visa

Redisgned her old websit with gatsby/react. Managing her social media and seo.

  • design
  • Gatsby/react development
  • newsletters
  • social media management

Migrated their old online proctoring system based on flash into a new system based on Janus Webrtc Gateway and react/redux.

  • AWS Lamdba
  • AWS EKS
  • Webrtc
  • Janus Gateway
  • React.js
  • Docker
  • Kubernetes

Web design has massively changed since we started back in 1995. Now with css3 and tools such as sass and react we have an amazingly broad pallete then add in thing like canvas and webgl and the canvas is huge. We help you decide which of these technologies fit your budget and your design vision and goals.

• Robust, scalable, and self-healing
  • Python, Node.js, React.js, .Net, and more
  • Infrastructure as Code
  • Webrtc Video/Audio/Data Channels
  • Live Media/data broadcast/streaming
  • NoOps / DevOps
  • AWS "everything": from Lambda to Fargate, to DynamoDB and beyond
  • Agile, Waterfall, and "wet agile" (bit of both!)
We will help you develop your audience and find ways to use the social media services to build your audience and reach.
